TopicTitle: The Mun could possible do with being a bit lighter

Articles.Content:
I know the Mun and The Moon are completely different things, but Mun looks too much like Ike to me. I think it should look a bit more like Dres, as the colour looks more like The Moon in real life. The new craters are absolutely fantastic though.

Edited July 29, 2013 by MelonHeadSeb
